article.title: 10 Things To Do Alone In Dubai
article.lead_paragraph: Dubai, one of the seven emirates in the United Arab Emirates, is undoubtedly a top travel destination not only in Asia but the entire world as well. Glamorous and affluent, the city is definitely not a holiday destination for backpackers or for people with budget constraints. On the contrary, Dubai has unlimited attractions to offer and visitors simply do not mind shelling out extra bucks here. This desert city is known for its liberal policies, superb infrastructure, and excellent tourist amenities. It enjoys a brilliant geographical location as many of the European countries can be reached within five hours by air and within three hours from a majority of the Middle East countries, the Indian subcontinent, and the Near East nations. In fact, the city offers the perfect excuse for partying, shopping, attending sporting events, some sinful pleasures, sightseeing, and fine dining. If we have managed to grab your attention and you are already planning to visit the place, here are our recommendations on the top things to do if you would be visiting Dubai alone.
article.meta_description: If we have managed to grab your attention and you are already planning to visit the place, here are our recommendations on the top things to do if you would be visiting Dubai alone.

snippets.title: 1. Explore Dubai by going on a half-day city sightseeing tour
snippets.title_with_numbering: 1. Explore Dubai by going on a half-day city sightseeing tour
snippets.description: Come; discover this beautiful desert city of U.A.E. as you embark upon your half-day city sightseeing tour. There will be an expert local guide who will make your Dubai tour look like a cakewalk. You will travel in a comfortable minivan or coach and take in the top landmarks of Dubai while absorbing the city’s cosmopolitan atmosphere. Do not forget to take photographs of the world-famous Burj Al-Arab Hotel, which is sail-shaped and has been in the news ever since it was built. Riding a water taxi can be real fun across the Dubai Creek for sure. You'll be heading into the Al Bastakiya district, known for its traditional character. Conclude the city tour with a visit to the spectacular Gold Souk and the Deira Spice Souk. You would definitely love exploring the innumerable jewelry and gold stores there.

snippets.title: 2. Feel your adrenalin rush at Aquaventure Waterpark in Dubai
snippets.title_with_numbering: 2. Feel your adrenalin rush at Aquaventure Waterpark in Dubai
snippets.description: Spend some action-packed time in Dubai’s Aquaventure Waterpark by buying yourself an all-day ticket at the entrance itself. The waterpark is part of the famous 5-star hotel and resort called Atlantis The Palm. It boasts of nail-biting adventures and spectacular water rides for all age groups.  Enjoy riding through the thrilling shark tunnels, take the corkscrew chutes' ride or observe kids having fun at the Splasher’s Island area. If you do not want to miss the Atlantis-themed aquarium or an entry to The Lost Chambers, all you need to do is simply upgrade your ticket.

snippets.title: 3. Look down from atop Burj Khalifa
snippets.title_with_numbering: 3. Look down from atop Burj Khalifa
snippets.description: Here is a wonderful opportunity for you to feel on top of the world while visiting Dubai. You simply need to purchase an entrance ticket to access the viewing point of Burj Khalifa’s 124th floor. As you ride the 65-meter (213-foot) moving sidewalk, enjoy watching a wonderful multimedia presentation, which narrates the story of this beautiful desert city as well as Burj Khalifa. Reach the observation deck by taking a high-speed elevator and enjoy the views of Burj-Al Arab, Dubai Marina, and other sights, which are simply mind-blowing from the top. There are powerful digital telescopes that can be used to view the surrounding landmarks below.

snippets.title: 4. Experience the finest Dubai desert safari tour
snippets.title_with_numbering: 4. Experience the finest Dubai desert safari tour
snippets.description: There is no better way to get acquainted with the beauty and the mysteries of the desert than going on the Dubai desert safari tour that lasts for six hours. A guide will accompany you in a cozy 4x4 as you leave from Dubai for your destination. Enjoy a superb mix of contemporary and traditional desert adventures during this trip. Experience the unique joy of riding a camel, enjoy dune bashing, and finally arrive at a campsite when the sun sets. You can get your hands tattooed with henna and watch the famous folk dance of the desert called "Tanoura." To top it off, you will also relish a scrumptious barbecue dinner and enjoy a mesmerizing belly dancing show around the campfire.

snippets.title: 5. Desert excursion and dinner with comfortable transport from Dubai
snippets.title_with_numbering: 5. Desert excursion and dinner with comfortable transport from Dubai
snippets.description: Enjoy an experience of a lifetime as you ride a vintage Land Rover while moving through the desert. This seven-hour unforgettable experience starts from Dubai. Marvel at the desert wildlife while driving into the well-known Dubai Desert Conservation Reserve. Watch a marvelous falconry display and then proceed toward a luxurious Bedouin-style camp. Also, experience some traditional desert activities such as a demonstration of making bread and a camel ride. A delectable dinner and some lively Arabian entertainment are definitely an icing on the cake.

snippets.title: 6. Boat tour around Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina
snippets.title_with_numbering: 6. Boat tour around Palm Jumeirah and Dubai Marina
snippets.description: You should definitely not let go of this excellent opportunity to enjoy a RIB (rigid inflatable boat) tour. The tour covers the magnificent coast of Dubai and lasts for either 75 or 90 minutes. You can board a boat from Dubai Marina and enjoy the rhythm of the waves as the boat picks up speed. Enjoy unhindered views of top tourist attractions like the royal palaces, Burj AI-Arab, Dubai Lagoon, Palm Jumeirah, and Palm Atlantis during the cruise. Each boat has a maximum capacity of only 10 persons, so you can really have a unique and personalized experience.

snippets.title: 7. Dinner cruise on stylish Bateaux Dubai
snippets.title_with_numbering: 7. Dinner cruise on stylish Bateaux Dubai
snippets.description: Sail smoothly along the famous Dubai Creek and marvel at the skyline of Dubai while enjoying fine gourmet dinner on this unique "Bateaux Dubai" evening cruise that lasts for about two-and-a-half hours. Get a red carpet treatment as you are greeted with a cool welcome drink. Also, enjoy the sights of Dubai's top tourist attractions including the Al Maktoum Bridge and Clocktower. The three-course dinner is accompanied by a beautiful piano performance. You can select a soda or go for one of the delectable house wines to accompany your food.

snippets.title: 8. Enjoy gourmet dinner on a suspended mid-air platform
snippets.title_with_numbering: 8. Enjoy gourmet dinner on a suspended mid-air platform
snippets.description: If you are an adventure seeker or a die-hard foodie, then do not miss this excellent activity in the city of Dubai. You will be served a three-course delicious meal by a chef while enjoying the superb views of the desert city as well as its surrounding waters. But the most unique feature of this excursion is that everything happens while being suspended on a platform up in the air.  So, enjoy this unique experience and cherish some best moments of your life.

snippets.title: 9. Amazing helicopter ride in Dubai
snippets.description: This amazing shared helicopter ride offers you some spectacular views of the city of Dubai from the air. The ride lasts for about 15 or 25 minutes. An experienced pilot has the controls while the chopper has seats for five passengers. Enjoy sights of top city attractions like Burj-Al-Arab and Palm Jumeirah among others as you soar above them. Do not forget snapping pictures of the landmarks from the air to capture the sights forever.

snippets.title: 10. Hot air balloon ride in Dubai (includes falconry demonstration and gourmet breakfast)
snippets.title_with_numbering: 10. Hot air balloon ride in Dubai (includes falconry demonstration and gourmet breakfast)
snippets.description: Do not miss the golden opportunity of an exciting hot air balloon ride in the desert city, which lasts for one hour. You will be taken to the launch location on an air-conditioned bus. Enjoy the experience of gliding over the magnificent dunes of the desert with an experienced pilot.  Also, watch a trained demonstration of the falcons flying high up in the air. Your ride will come to an end with a delicious dessert after you land.

snippets.title: Dazzling Dubai, a dream destination
snippets.description: The beautiful city of Dubai has something in store for everyone irrespective of nationality, gender, or age group. Not only is it a premier shopping destination in the region but it's also known for its host of outdoor adventure activities, which are packaged in a tourist-friendly manner. If you are really craving for a great holiday, refer to the above-mentioned activities and enjoy a memorable vacation in Dubai!
